name: bills
description: Browser-based receipt OCR and analysis demo

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && cp src/style.css dist/style.css && npm run copy:pdf
scripts.copy:pdf: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const srcFile=(name)=>path.join('node_modules','pdfjs-dist','build',name);const distFile=(name)=>path.join('dist',name);const files=['pdf.min.js','pdf.worker.min.js'];if(!fs.existsSync('dist'))fs.mkdirSync('dist');if(files.every((f)=>fs.existsSync(srcFile(f)))){for(const f of files){fs.copyFileSync(srcFile(f),distFile(f));console.log('copied',f);} } else {console.warn('pdf.js not installed; skipping copy. PDF support will fall back to CDN.');}"
